resources.string: St. Francis Road, Whitchurch, Cardiff, CF14 1AW

Set in the popular ‘village’ of Whitchurch in North Cardiff, Whitchurch Tennis Club (WTC) has been in existence for over 100 years. The club features 7 all-weather hard courts (3 floodlit), a practice wall, a large modern clubhouse with a licensed bar and ample parking.

 All standards of play are catered for from beginner to advanced, with recreational tennis and inter-club league tennis all year round.

 There’s a year round coaching programme for adults and juniors and the quiet residential area around the club provides a safe, family-friendly environment.

 New members and visitors are always welcome at WTC!!
